name: animated_gif
description: Javascript library for creating animated GIFs

scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:worker
scripts.build:main: browserify src/Animated_GIF.js --standalone Animated_GIF | tee dist/Animated_GIF.js | uglifyjs --mangle > dist/Animated_GIF.min.js
scripts.build:worker: browserify src/Animated_GIF.worker.js | tee dist/Animated_GIF.worker.js | uglifyjs --mangle > dist/Animated_GIF.worker.min.js
